author: MSNBC
title: Trump wins CPAC straw poll, revs up campaign speculation amid Biden polling collapse
description: Former President Donald Trump overwhelmingly won a straw poll at the nation’s top conservative conference Sunday, another sign of his continued dominance.
content:
ORLANDO Former President Donald Trump overwhelmingly won a straw poll at the nations top conservative conference Sunday, another sign of his continued dominance in the GOP.
